name: Hunting Game (itch)
description:
Wild animals are ruling the green forest. You are chosen to fight this war where the animals rule.

As the hunter, you will have to take down animals. These wild animals are powerless against your shotgun, this powerful weapon can take down any animal in just one shot and in return you will be rewarded with credits, as the number of corpses increases so will your credit score.

Can you really take over the forest?

This is a student created game. You can support these students creators by playing their game and giving them feedback.

Are you a student or graduate looking to get into the industry?

Learn about our PROTOGÉ Initiative for real-time 3D careers over at: https://protoge.uk

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/PROTOGEuk
developers: I N F I N I T Y 27
